title: Hades

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Judge someone each night. You'll learn their role, and attack them if they're capable of killing.
- Use the ability of a dead player at night. Their attack, if applicable, will be changed to Piercing.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you judge a Fallen Angel, you can't be roleblocked or redirected while doing so, and they'll be cleaned but you'll still be able to use their ability.
- If you judge a non-Fallen Angel and fail to kill them, your attack against them will be upgraded to Unstoppable.
